<p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?city=chicago" rel="city">CHICAGO</a>, Feb. 7. [<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1868">1868</a>]
</p><p>
MR. BRADY : I hereby authorize Mrs. Keckley to request my bill from you ; also my goods. 
</p><p>
An exact account must be given of everything, 
and all goods unsold returned to me. Pray hand <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=ezk" rel="met friend">Mrs. Keckley</a> my bill, without fail, immediately. 
</p><p>
Respectfully, 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=mtl" rel="me">M. LINCOLN.</a>
</p>
